chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: Type
Rone: R
Rzero: R
Rminus: R -> R -> R
Rmult: R -> R -> R
Rplus: R -> R -> R
Ropp: R -> R
R_is_ring: ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq

Goal:
forall x y u : M22, (y ⊞ u) ⊠ x = y ⊠ x ⊞ u ⊠ x

Premises:
ring_theory : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> Prop
Notation z := Rzero
M22 = (R * R * R * R)%type : Type
Notation o := Rone
M22_mult_distr_l : forall x y u : M22, x ⊠ (y ⊞ u) = x ⊠ y ⊞ x ⊠ u
M22mult_assoc : forall x y u : M22, x ⊠ (y ⊠ u) = x ⊠ y ⊠ u
M22plus_assoc : forall x y u : M22, x ⊞ (y ⊞ u) = x ⊞ y ⊞ u
eq_sigT2_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A & ?P a & ?Q a}, sigT_of_sigT2 u = sigT_of_sigT2 v -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- Type] ?P : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- ?A -> Type] ?Q : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R ->...-> Type]
eq_sigT2_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?Q x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A & ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> sigT_of_sigT2 u = sigT_of_sigT2 v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- Type] ?P : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- ?A ->...-> Type]
eq_sig2_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, {p : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) | eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) & eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj3_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R ->...-> Prop]
eq_sig2_uncurried_iff : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> {p : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) | eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) & eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj3_sig v} where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R ->...-> Prop]
Rring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list R) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe2
M22mult_one_l : forall x : M22, ID_22 ⊠ x = x
M22mult_one_r : forall x : M22, x ⊠ ID_22 = x
M22plus_comm : forall x y : M22, x ⊞ y = y ⊞ x
M22plus_cancel : forall x a b : M22, x ⊞ a = x ⊞ b -> a = b
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
msum_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = u
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
M22minus : forall x : M22, x ⊞ ⊟ x = ZE_22
Rmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
Radd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Rdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
mk_rt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) ->...-> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
M22plus_zero : forall m : M22, ZE_22 ⊞ m = m
rsub_ext4 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rsub x x0) (rsub y y0)
mk_art : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) ->...-> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
ARadd_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd (radd x y) z) (radd (radd y z) x)
Radd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
Rmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
msum_msum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> X), (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, i1 < n -> j1 < k -> i2 < n -> j2 < k -> m (f i1 j1) (f i2 j2) = m (f i2 j2) (f i1 j1)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => msum m u k (f i)) = msum m u k (fun j : nat => msum m u n (fun i : nat => f i j))
msum_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> m (f j) (g i) = m (g i) (f j)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => m (f i) (g i)) = m (msum m u n f) (msum m u n g)
msum_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> m (f i) a = m a (f i)) -> m (msum m u n f) a = m a (msum m u n f)
